title: Monster Mania #01 [1966-10] (Darwination-McCoy)
description: Monster Mania was a short-lived 1960s movie monster/horror magazine with nice production values which was published by Renaissance Productions and edited by Russ Jones of Creepy fame. It unfortunately lasted only three issues.Â  Monster Mania #01 [1966-10]. Cover photo of Christopher Lee as Dracula. Articles include: "Interview With Jack Pierce" ("First published interview with the master of makeup"); "The Reptile" ("Hammer's latest and greatest horror shocker since Horror of Dracula"); "Caught In The Act" ("Behind the scenes 'goodies' from Hammer's House of Horrors"); "Monster Gallery" ("Rare shots of filmdom's most famous fiends"); "The Peter Cushing Story Part 1" ("Little known facts of one of today's Masters of the macabre").
